Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Eatsbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison and #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Division/Ridgeland
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, Augusta and Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Division/Ridgeland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Ogden and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via26th, Kostner, Ogden and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Kilbourn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
